doc.field: F E f8193reute d f BC-TRUS-JOIST-TJCO>-TO 03-18 0049
TRUS JOIST TJCO> TO ACQUIRE CANADIAN FIRM

Trus Joist Corp said it agreed to purchase Dashwood Industries Ltd, a Canadian wood window and patio door manufacturer, for an undisclosed amount of cash. Trus Joist said it expects to close the transaction before June 30. Reuter
